name: terminal-jarvis
description: A thin Rust wrapper that provides a unified interface for managing and running AI coding tools

scripts.copy-binary: mkdir -p bin && cp ../../target/release/terminal-jarvis bin/terminal-jarvis && chmod +x bin/terminal-jarvis
scripts.build: npm run sync-readme && npm run copy-binary && npx tsc
scripts.postinstall:
node -e "console.log('
ðŸ¤– Terminal Jarvis v0.0.23 installed successfully!

âœ… Full T.JARVIS interface ready to use!

Run: npx terminal-jarvis
')"

author: BA-CalderonMorales
